OK, well to begin with, yes, it ought to be the LAST rule else the other rules won't be processed
You are running a local HTTP and IRC server?
Your rules are on the INPUT chain; that is packets coming into an interface from an external connection.
What you want is a rule to allow existing ESTABLISHED, RELATED connections
